card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
card.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
card.text: Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered. Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue {R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

card.name: Akroma's Vengeance
card.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ancient Stirrings
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

card.name: Animar, Soul of Elements
card.text: Protection from white and from black Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Ash Barrens
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
card.text: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

card.name: Balduvian Horde
card.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Bident of Thassa
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Blue Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
card.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Brine Elemental
card.text: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips his or her next untap step.

card.name: Brion Stoutarm
card.text: Lifelink {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature other than Brion Stoutarm: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player.

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chalice of the Void
card.text: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

card.name: Cloudblazer
card.text: Flying When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

card.name: Cloudshift
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Coalition Relic
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Conflux
card.text: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Cursecatcher
card.text: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
card.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Decree of Justice
card.text: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Doomsday
card.text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Eladamri's Call
card.text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Elvish Piper
card.text: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
card.text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

card.name: Exclude
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Fathom Seer
card.text: Morph-Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Flash
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

card.name: Flooded Grove
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {G/U}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{U}, or {U}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Fortune Thief
card.text: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. Morph {R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Frenzied Goblin
card.text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
card.text: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Goblin War Drums
card.text: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
card.text: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
card.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hell's Caretaker
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Hordeling Outburst
card.text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Ihsan's Shade
card.text: Protection from white

card.name: Imperial Recruiter
card.text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Invigorate
card.text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay Invigorate's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Izzet Chemister
card.text: Haste {R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
card.text: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. 0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. -1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. -12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

card.name: Jalira, Master Polymorphist
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Kindle
card.text: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

card.name: Kor Firewalker
card.text: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Laquatus's Champion
card.text: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life. When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life. {B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Living Death
card.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Living Wish
card.text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

card.name: Luminarch Ascension
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) {1}{W}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

card.name: Magus of the Wheel
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Master of the Wild Hunt
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. {T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.

card.name: Mishra's Factory
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Murder
card.text: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.text: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

card.name: Nettle Sentinel
card.text: Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.

card.name: Nezumi Cutthroat
card.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Nezumi Cutthroat can't block.

card.name: Nicol Bolas
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Pact of Negation
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Pendelhaven
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
card.text: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

card.name: Pillage
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Promise of Bunrei
card.text: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

card.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
card.text: Flying When you cast Prossh, Skyraider of Kher, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Prossh. Sacrifice another creature: Prossh gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Protean Hulk
card.text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ratcatcher
card.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Red Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - • Counter target blue spell. • Destroy target blue permanent.

card.name: Reef Worm
card.text: When Reef Worm dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with 'When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"

card.name: Relentless Rats
card.text: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

card.name: Renewed Faith
card.text: You gain 6 life. Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.

card.name: Rest in Peace
card.text: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Rishadan Port
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
card.text: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Simian Spirit Guide
card.text: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Spikeshot Goblin
card.text: {R}, {T}: Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Strionic Resonator
card.text: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

card.name: Summoner's Pact
card.text: Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.text: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

card.name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
card.text: First strike Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Tree of Redemption
card.text: Defender {T}: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.

card.name: Twilight Mire
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Undead Gladiator
card.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
card.text: As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down." Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Vindicate
card.text: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Willbender
card.text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

card.name: Zombify
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
